name: Reg Disable Security Service
description: Detects a suspicious reg.exe invocation that looks as if it would disable an important security service
query: ((process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Ee][Gg].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Aa][Dd][Dd].*/) AND ((process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Dd]\ 4.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Vv]\ [Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\\[Ss][Ee][Nn][Ss][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd].*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Mm][Pp][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ii][Ss][Ss][Rr][Vv].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Dd][Bb][Oo][Oo][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Dd][Nn][Ii][Ss][Dd][Rr][Vv].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Dd][Nn][Ii][Ss][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Uu][Aa][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv].*/ OR /.*\\[Uu][Ss][Oo][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ii][Dd][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/)) OR (process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Dd]\ 1.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Oo][Aa][Vv][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Oo][Nn][Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Rr][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ii][Nn][Ee][Ll][Yy][Tt][Aa][Kk][Ii][Nn][Gg][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Rr][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Aa][Tt][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ss][Tt][Ss][Ee][Ee][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ee][Hh][Aa][Vv][Ii][Oo][Rr][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ee][Nn][Hh][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee][Dd][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ii][Ff][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Ss][Pp][Yy][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Ss][Pp][Yy][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee][Rr][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Gg].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Aa][Cc][Yy][Mm][Oo][Dd][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ii][Gg][Nn][Aa][Tt][Uu][Rr][Ee][Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Oo][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp][Ww][Ii][Tt][Hh][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ee][Nn][Gg][Ii][Nn][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Aa][Rr][Cc][Hh][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Nn][Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Rr][Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg].*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*reg* AND process.command_line:*add*) AND ((process.command_line:*\ \/d\ 4* AND process.command_line:*\ \/v\ Start* AND process.command_line:(*\\Sense* OR *\\WinDefend* OR *\\MsMpSvc* OR *\\NisSrv* OR *\\WdBoot* OR *\\WdNisDrv* OR *\\WdNisSvc* OR *\\wscsvc* OR *\\SecurityHealthService* OR *\\wuauserv* OR *\\UsoSvc* OR *\\WdFilter* OR *\\AppIDSvc*)) OR (process.command_line:*\ \/d\ 1* AND process.command_line:*Windows\ Defender* AND process.command_line:(*DisableIOAVProtection* OR *DisableOnAccessProtection* OR *DisableRoutinelyTakingAction* OR *DisableScanOnRealtimeEnable* OR *DisableBlockAtFirstSeen* OR *DisableBehaviorMonitoring* OR *DisableEnhancedNotifications* OR *DisableAntiSpyware* OR *DisableAntiSpywareRealtimeProtection* OR *DisableConfig* OR *DisablePrivacyMode* OR *SignatureDisableUpdateOnStartupWithoutEngine* OR *DisableArchiveScanning* OR *DisableIntrusionPreventionSystem* OR *DisableScriptScanning*))))`
